article: the dalai lama , the exiled tibetan spiritual leader , issued a three-point statement sunday prior to his departure for taiwan for a six-day visit , reiterating that his trip has nothing to do with politics or any political group .
abstract: dalai lama distances himself from politics before trip to taiwan
candidates: the dalai lama issued a three-point statement prior to his departure for taiwan.
